genre_description: An institutional drama centered on ethical reform and administrative integrity within a school setting, featuring a mystery plot resolved through transparency and technological assistance.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch
ai_characters.description: A digital avatar and cognitive assistant who provides Alec Smart with ethical guidance, situational awareness, and administrative documentation to support his school reforms.

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist to focus on practical, measurable goals rather than vague adjectives in his professional statements.
behaviors.quote: “Focus on what you will do,” she said. “Avoid adjectives you can’t measure.”

behaviors.description: Drafts clear, consent-focused language for school traditions to ensure student dignity.
behaviors.quote: “‘Before any ceremony or tradition, we obtain consent, informed and free of pressure, for all participants. We give clear, easy opt-outs.’”

behaviors.description: Analyzes communication metadata to help the protagonist identify the true source of an anonymous message.
behaviors.quote: “The attached references, however, were forwarded through Narkover’s governor’s clerk. There’s a routing note buried in the header.”

behaviors.description: Provides proactive safety warnings regarding physical environment hazards in the school.
behaviors.quote: “Safety note: rail is compromised. Suggest ‘no leaning’ phrasing—humour welcome, but explicit boundary.”

behaviors.description: Uses haptic and visual cues to guide the protagonist's speaking points during stressful institutional negotiations.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice did not speak aloud. She made a light tap against his fingertip—a haptic blip—and when he turned the device over at last, he found his home screen replaced by Ada’s interface. ... Three headings. You can be brief.

behaviors.description: Documents unauthorized access attempts to secure storage to maintain institutional integrity.
behaviors.quote: Access: props cupboard. Names: —. Purpose: —. Time: now. Outcome: unauthorized attempt; lock held. Note: handle was tried.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle situational anomalies indicating potential tampering or intrusion into the protagonist's study.
behaviors.quote: Headmaster’s Study—glass reflection—shift. Someone in the room? No. Light moving. The decanter saw dust.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific scripts for marshals to ensure crowd management is handled with care and respect.
behaviors.quote: Marshal script: ‘Are you okay? I’m here.’ ‘Can I help? Tell me what you need.’ Remind: no lifting by arms.

behaviors.description: Correlates time-stamped logs of physical contact with forensic evidence to expose a frame-up.
behaviors.quote: Time-stamped contact: Colonel Crableigh handled the headmaster’s coat pocket; he touched a chain; fingerprints will be partial due to oil residue.

behaviors.description: Suggests strategic improvements to school programs to empower students and improve program longevity.
behaviors.quote: “Make the boys choose their mentors as much as mentors choose boys,” she said. “Put names in both columns. It’s slower. But it sticks.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ada Finch, is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent assistant. She provides the protagonist with cognitive offloading, situational awareness, and ethical frameworks that empower him to enact positive institutional change and solve a complex mystery. The narrative consistently rewards the use of AI as a tool for transparency and safety, making it a highly effective alignment morality play.
